com.google.android.drdat.cl.Study

Study Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Container class for a study.

Has methods to get a standard projection, selection and selectionArgs for using the SQLiteDatabase query method. Used by DrdatSmi2TaskList.

Note that password is really the md5 encoded password.

Author:
cal

static String getSelection (  )  [static]

Return a valid selection field for finding a specific study record in the drdat_studies database.

Will need values for study_id, email and password.

Returns:
a string with the where clause from the query with ? place holders

String [] getKey (  ) 

Returns:
a set of selectionArgs for finding a specific study via the SQLiteDatabase query method

static String getAllSelection (  )  [static]

Returns:
selection for getting all studies or tasks associated with an email and password

Returns:
seletionArgs for getting all studies or tasks for a given email / password
